title: fps
body: I constanly play with very low fps...i have a reasonable graphic card, and i have the exact same fps on very right and very low (40-55 max) i dont really know why that happens but i thought lowering the fps would fix it but no changes. i went to fps issues link but i've tried everything and nothing worked

replies.body: You might have some outdated drivers or bad game files causing some hiccups during your game.  No worries, run through the steps in the [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide to tune up your PC and smooth things out in game!  Test it out in a custom first, though, and let me know if that helps.
